entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Small Regions 2001. The situation of the disadvantaged Hungarian schools in the area of public education. Self-government sample.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E75o: TÁRKI Small Regions 2001. The situation of the disadvantaged Hungarian schools in the area of public education. Self-government sample.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Imre, Anna
entry.dcterms:description: the population of the settlement, migration in the past years, measures aimed at maintaining the population, job opportunities, settlement infrastructure
entry.dcterms:subject: demography
minorities
migration
education, school
public services
survey data
cross-section

As a starting point of the research, 6 underprivileged regions were selected, and all schools within this area was included in the sample. The local self-government questionnaire was completed by the mayor of the specific settlement or the person named by the mayor.
face-to-face interview
A
